pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - GlowGrace: Elevating Your Natural Radiance GlowGrace beauty care service HOME ABOUT US Services Contact Privacy Policy GlowGrace is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website. Information We Collect **Personal Information:** When you contact us through our website, you may provide us with certain personal information, such as your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address. **Automatic Information:** We may also collect certain information automatically when you visit our website. This information may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, the referring website, the pages you visit on our website, and the time you spend on each page. How We Use Your Information **To respond to your inquiries and fulfill your requests.** **To send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers. (You can opt out of receiving these communications at any time.)** **To improve our website and your user experience.** How We Share Your Information We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate our website and business. These service providers are contractually obligated to keep your information confidential and to use it only for the purposes for which we disclose it to them. We may also disclose your information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such disclosure is necessary to comply with a court order, subpoena, or other legal process. Your Choices You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those communications. You can also access and update your personal information by contacting us. The GlowGrace website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline GlowGrace beauty care service Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
